channel.title: Ike on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Ike on TLDRBins

item.title: VPN
item.description: Enum # Check with ikeV1 ike-scan -M <TARGET> # Check with ikeV2 ike-scan -M --ikev2 <TARGET> Connect to VPN Tools sudo apt install strongswan Settings # Edit /etc/ipsec.secrets %any : PSK <PASSWORD> # Edit /etc/ipsec.conf (copy from ike-scan result) config setup charondebug="all" uniqueids=yes strictcrlpolicy=no conn testvpn authby=secret auto=add ike=3des-sha1-modp1024! esp=3des-sha1! type=transport keyexchange=ikev1 left=<LOCAL> right=<TARGET> rightsubnet=<TARGET>[tcp] Connect # Reset ipsec restart # Connect ipsec up testvpn
